attributes.additional_details: It is far too hard for parents do live and raise a child with he current financial budget and it is very difficult to return to work when the baby is only few months old. With no help from family members (as not all might have) the parents are pushed to choose between raising a child or obtaining the basis needs.

rejection.details:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/632083

We also can't accept petitions without a full name.
